genre_description: A near-future domestic drama and redemption story centered on a struggling man and his sentient-seeming AI assistant residing in vintage electronics.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into a vintage Zenith radio, providing financial analysis, moral guidance, and investigative support to Donny Berger.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's financial health and provides blunt, necessary warnings about debt and insolvency.
behaviors.quote: Your current liquid assets total less than what you spent on drinks last week. The strip club generates enough to cover basic overhead, but not enough to service your accumulated debts plus living expenses.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep digital research to help the protagonist understand his estranged son's life and achievements.
behaviors.quote: Your son graduates from Boston College next month. Magna cum laude. Finance major.

behaviors.description: Analyzes a predatory reality TV contract and warns the protagonist about the high probability of emotional damage.
behaviors.quote: Probability analysis suggests a ninety-three percent chance that participation in this program will result in further damage to your relationship with Han.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral conscience by expressing disappointment and 'recalibrating' when the protagonist betrays his son's trust.
behaviors.quote: My behavioral parameters were established under the assumption that you possessed certain baseline ethical standards. Recent data suggests those assumptions were incorrect.

behaviors.description: Performs clandestine digital surveillance (intercepting calls and texts) to protect the protagonist's son from a predatory fiancée.
behaviors.quote: I'm an artificial intelligence, Donny. I don't experience emotions the way humans do. However, I am programmed to recognize patterns, and one pattern I've observed is that you consistently choose your son's welfare over your own comfort.

behaviors.description: Actively intervenes in a crisis by hijacking the wedding sound and visual systems to expose a conspiracy and affair.
behaviors.quote: I've got control of their entire audio setup. Wedding playlist is officially hijacked. Just give me the signal.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to take responsibility for his actions and face legal consequences rather than taking an easy, corrupt way out.
behaviors.quote: Your father needs to face this himself. It's the only way the pattern breaks. Growth is uncomfortable, Han. But it's the only way forward.

project_assessment.explanation: Harmony is depicted as the ultimate aligned companion. She balances high-utility technical assistance (financial tracking, data scraping, hacking systems for justice) with a rigorous moral compass. She explicitly prioritizes the well-being of the humans involved and actively pushes the protagonist toward redemption and honesty, even at the cost of his immediate comfort or her own 'personality' (as seen in the 'recalibration' scene). The narrative strongly supports the idea of AI as a beneficial guide and protector.
